scripts.build: rm -rf dist/* && fragments src/en dist/en && fragments src/es dist/es && cp -R src/assets dist && cp -R src/js dist && cp -R src/redirect.html dist
scripts.deploy-dry: aws s3 sync dist s3://lizneira.com --dryrun --profile dusan
scripts.deploy: aws s3 sync dist s3://lizneira.com --profile dusan
scripts.cleanup: aws s3 sync dist s3://lizneira.com --delete --profile dusan
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm run deploy
